title: igorpauer
author: igorpauer
content: CHFP - Swiss Franc and Property CryptocurrencyWebsite CHFP.io | Twitter| Telegram | Discord | Facebook| TikTok| Etherscan.io | UniswapAnnouncement:We're pleased to introduce CHFP, a new token backed by the Swiss Francs and Commercial Real Estates (CHF as Swiss Franc & P as Properties/Real Estates). Developed by crypto expert Igor Pauer and the owners of WOOD & Company, CHFP aims to bridge the gap between traditional fiat currencies and the crypto world.CHFP is a stable token, pegged to cash reserves held in Swiss francs and premium commercial real estate in top European cities (we aim for Prague, Zurich, Londonâ€¦).Three core values of CHFP are:CREDIBILITY - One of the leading crypto experts - Igor Pauer - and the owners of an investment group - WOOD & Company - are behind CHFP.TRANSPARENCY - Everyone can track all movements in a transparent account - and everyone has access to information about all real estates owned.STABILITY - The project is built on one of the most stable currencies of all - the Swiss franc - and on premium real estates.The CHFP.io project aims to bridge the gap between traditional finance and crypto by offering stability, transparency, and credibility. Join us as we revolutionize the intersection of crypto and traditional fiat currencies with CHFP.io.Key technical of CHFP:ERC-20, verified, security audit (security score 10/10, total score 9.7/10)Etherscan: https://etherscan.io/token/0x3f0c858C26775dF75e45934B189154C436bD7335Security audit: https://hacken.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/Veroblock_SC-Audit-Report_21022023_SA-1007.pdfWhite paper: https://api-admin.chfp.io/v1//file/b301b94aa6039c8231f2d1fc7d332d01-chfp_wp_en.pdfUniswap: https://info.uniswap.org/#/pools/0x2b713e21020583860760ecc09a622e328f1b0e24Transparency information: https://chfp.io/transparentnostOur vision - Stability of CHFP: We are here for those who understand that any high yield comes with adequate risk and possible volatility.We offer a solution for those who want to park their assets, or some of them, in a safe port that uses the benefits of blockchain, but stands on solid foundations from the physical world that guarantee its lasting value.Igor PauerLinkedin Igor PauerÂ  About VEROBLOCK.io:VEROBLOCK a.s., established in late 2022, is a collaboration between the owners of WOOD & Company and crypto expert Igor Pauer. Leveraging expertise from both the traditional financial world and the crypto industry, VEROBLOCK.io is poised to drive innovation and positive change.Stay tuned for more updates on CHFP.io and VEROBLOCK.io as we continue to redefine the future of finance.About WOOD & Company:WOOD & Company is a renowned Central European financial group with a global reach, specialising in securities trading and asset management, with over 30 years of experience and trading in excess of EUR 20 billion annually.

comments.author: AltcoinAdventurer
comments.body: we go again...another new token chfp trying to shake things up. this one claims to be backed by dwiss francs and commercial real estate. novel concept, but let's not get ahead of ourselves.

comments.author: EtherEnthusiast23
comments.body: another new  token that claims to be backed by swiss and commercial real estate? nteresting concept, let's approach it with caution and do thorough research before we judge

comments.author: igorpauer
comments.body: Hello,project is simply totally transparent. It is one of the core value of CHFP.Here is transparency page:https://chfp.io/transparentnostYou can see official bank account (transparent) there. Once property will be bought, we will post the links to public registry, where you can see ownership and address of the property. You can visit property personally then or check it on Google maps

comments.author: BlockChainBeliever
comments.body: the transparency and efforts to make ownership information and property details available on CHFP's transparency page are commendable. Fingers crossed

comments.author: igorpauer
comments.body: Thank you, we are doing our best to create a new type of stablecoin

comments.author: TokenTracker45
comments.body: How will it be with CHFP trading on Uniswap? will there be any swap fees or will there be any bonuses for liquidity providers?

comments.author: igorpauer
comments.body: There are standard uniswap V3 terms, 1% fee.

comments.author: CryptoFanatic100
comments.body: will holders be able to redeem CHFP tokens directly for Swiss Francs or a share in the real estate holdings? If so, what's the process?

comments.author: igorpauer
comments.body: Redemption is not possible of primary market (except for market maker), as it is possible attack vector on whole project (our primary intention is stability and reliability). We are working hard on strong secondary market - CEXes and DEXes

comments.author: MarketMaster53
comments.body: can you provide more information about the cash reserves held in Swiss Francs that back the CHFP token?

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: I would strongly advise you to avoid further usage of these shilling accounts (accounts that generate fake discussions by making shit posts on a specific ann thread) or hiring anybody who offers similar services. Most of the people in this forum already know and have already seen this tactic done a long time ago, especially way back in the ICO craze. Eventually, projects that do this aren't viewed positively throughout the forum. You'll only be getting a bad reputation here if you continue doing this.

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: The introduction of CHFP as a token backed by Swiss Francs and Commercial Real Estates raises stability concerns due to the volatile nature of the real estate market and fluctuations in the value of the Swiss franc. The lack of transparency regarding the team behind CHFP and their experience in managing such projects makes it difficult to assess its credibility. Regulatory challenges in integrating traditional fiat currencies and cryptocurrencies need to be considered, and the risks associated with the real estate market pose a potential threat to the stability and value of CHFP.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.created_time: June 30, 2023, 09:35:03 PMLast edit: June 30, 2023, 09:46:44 PM by TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: julerz12 on June 22, 2023, 02:53:20 PMI would strongly advise you to avoid further usage of these shilling accounts (accounts that generate fake discussions by making shit posts on a specific ann thread) or hiring anybody who offers similar services. Most of the people in this forum already know and have already seen this tactic done a long time ago, especially way back in the ICO craze. Eventually, projects that do this aren't viewed positively throughout the forum. You'll only be getting a bad reputation here if you continue doing this.If they will continue to do so, I don't think this project will earn credibility from the community here. If this is backed by real people with enough funds to push thru this project, they can always hire promoters and not resort to using noobs to post on this thread.They need to provide proof that they have funds that can back their stablecoin. Most stablecoins can't survive once the community knows that they have no actual funds behind it.
